title: Marijuana Horticulture - The Indoor Outdoor Medical Grower
description:
[u][b]Marijuana Horticulture - The Indoor/Outdoor Medical Grower's Bible - Reduced Size[/b][/u]
[i]by Jorge Cervantes[/i]

This is an optimized, page corrected version of the original scan floating around the internet, which will only run on [b]Adobe Reader 8.0 or later[/b]. It is [b]512 pages[/b] in length and [b]104Mb[/b] in size.

If you don't have Adobe Reader 8.0 or later, or don't want to install it, the corrected, [b]UN-optimized[/b] is available at the torrent below
[url]http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4738035[/url]
It is also [b]512 pages[/b] long, and weighs in at about [b]495Mb[/b].

Hope you all appreciate this. This is one of the greatest books, if not [u]THE[/u] greatest book written on the subject.

EDIT: You may need to save as a shorter filename if you encounter problems downloading.
